seo.title: UUID Generator - Create Unique Identifiers Efficiently
seo.description: Skip the hassle of manual coding. Use our UUID Generator web tool to create unique identifiers fixable for various uses, including databases, systems, and more.
seo.keywords: UUID Generator, Unique Identifier Generator, Free UUID Generator, Online UUID Tool, UUID Creation Tool

html.html:
<html>
<head>
<title>UUID Generator</title>
<script>
function generateUUID() {
var d = new Date().getTime();
if (typeof performance !== 'undefined' && typeof performance.now === 'function') {
d += performance.now();
}
return 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function (c) {
var r = (d + Math.random() * 16) % 16 | 0;
d = Math.floor(d / 16);
return (c === 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8)).toString(16);
});
}
document.getElementById('generate').addEventListener('click', function() {
document.getElementById('uuid').value = generateUUID();
});
</script>
</head>
<body>
<button id='generate'>Generate UUID</button>
<input type='text' id='uuid' readonly>
</body>
</html>
